on reading compounds: 評【ヒョウ】criticism, commentary, a council
評価【ヒョウカ】valuation, appraisal, evaluation, assessment, estimation, rating, judging, appreciation, recognition, acknowledgement, rating highly, praising
総評【ソウヒョウ】general comment, Sohyo (General Council of Trade Unions of Japan)
講評【コウヒョウ】criticism (by a teacher or coach, with commentary, especially at a poetry reading), review, critique
